mapper.select: select review_place_no, place_name, place_basic_address, place_detail_address, place_review, main_photo, status from review_place where review_day_no=#{no} order by review_place_no asc

select p.review_place_no, p.place_name, p.place_basic_address, p.place_detail_address, p.place_review, p.main_photo, p.status, d.review_day_no from review_place p inner join review_days d on p.review_day_no=d.review_day_no where p.review_place_no=#{no}
select review_place_no, place_name, place_basic_address, place_detail_address, place_review, main_photo, status from review_place where review_day_no

select u.user_no, r.review_no, r.create_date, r.status, d.review_day_no, d.title, d.day_date, d.day_review, d.main_photo, d.status, p.review_place_no, p.place_name, p.place_basic_address, p.place_detail_address, p.place_review, p.main_photo, p.status, t.photo_no, t.photo_file from reviews r inner join users u on r.user_no=u.user_no inner join review_days d on r.review_no=d.review_no inner join review_place p on d.review_day_no=p.review_day_no inner join review_place_photo t on p.review_place_no=t.review_place_no where p.review_place_no=#{no}
